00023 #ifndef _CTK_SPU_PROFILE_H
00024 #define _CTK_SPU_PROFILE_H
00025 
00031 #include "ctk_spu_common.h"
00032 #include <limits.h>
00033 
00034 #ifdef __SPU__
00035 
00036 #ifdef __cplusplus
00037 extern "C" {
00038 #endif
00039 
00041 typedef struct {
00042     signed int start;
00043     signed int end;
00044 } ctk_profile_t;
00045 
00051 static inline void ctk_profile_start(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00052     ctk_do_profiling = 1;
00053     spu_writech(SPU_WrDec, INT_MAX);
00054     prof->start = spu_readch(SPU_RdDec);
00055 }
00056 
00062 static inline unsigned int ctk_profile_read(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00063     prof->end = spu_readch(SPU_RdDec);
00064     return (prof->start - prof->end) / 
00065                 (unsigned int)(ctk_timebase_clock * 1.0e-3);
00066 }
00067 
00073 static inline unsigned int ctk_profile_read_in_msec(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00074     prof->end = spu_readch(SPU_RdDec);
00075     return (prof->start - prof->end) / 
00076                 (unsigned int)(ctk_timebase_clock * 1.0e-3);
00077 }
00078 
00084 static inline unsigned int ctk_profile_end(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00085     prof->end = spu_readch(SPU_RdDec);
00086     ctk_do_profiling = 0;
00087     return (prof->start - prof->end) / 
00088                 (unsigned int)(ctk_timebase_clock * 1.0e-3);
00089 }
00090 
00096 static inline int ctk_profile_read_in_usec(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00097     prof->end = spu_readch(SPU_RdDec);
00098     return (prof->start - prof->end) / 
00099                 (unsigned int)(ctk_timebase_clock * 1.0e-6);
00100 }
00101 
00107 static inline int ctk_profile_read_in_clock(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00108     prof->end = spu_readch(SPU_RdDec);
00109     return (prof->start - prof->end);
00110 }
00111 
00113 static inline void ctk_profile_init() {
00114     ctk_do_profiling = 1;
00115     spu_writech(SPU_WrDec, INT_MAX);
00116 }
00117 
00119 static inline void ctk_profile_reset(ctk_profile_t *prof) {
00120     prof->start = spu_readch(SPU_RdDec);
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 #ifdef PROFILE
00125 # include <stdio.h>
00126 # define PROFILE_START() { \
00127     ctk_profile_t prof; \
00128     ctk_profile_start(&prof);
00129 # define PROFILE_END(...) \
00130     int __clocks = ctk_profile_read_in_clock(&prof); \
00131     char __buf[256]; \
00132     sprintf(__buf, __VA_ARGS__); \
00133     printf("[profile %s:%d] %s: %d clocks.\n", \
00134         __FILE__, __LINE__, __buf, __clocks); \
00135     }
00136 #else /* !PROFILE */
00137 # define PROFILE_START()  
00138 # define PROFILE_END(fmt,...) 
00140 #endif /* !PROFILE */
00141 
00142 #ifdef __cplusplus
00143 }
00144 #endif
00145 
00146 #endif /* __SPU__ */
00147 
00148 #endif /* _CTK_SPU_PROFILE_H */
